issue.title: [CF 6] 3.2.2 Issues
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.58, Microsoft Windows NT 6.0.6002 Service Pack 2

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 1.1.2

Description

It seems that after the most recent mini patched dropped, I have encountered errors with multiple spell detection, using one icon. Also, it seems that the duel spec support is not working as well.

Installed Addons

Atlasloot Enhanced - v5.09.05 Auctioneer - Auctioneer Suite 5.7.4568 Bejeweled - Bejeweled v1.1b BigWigs Bossmods - r7106-release Chinchilla Minimap - v2.1 Dominos - 1.15.3b DrainSoulTimer - DrainSoulTimer2.1 FuBar - FriendsFu - 2.4.4 - r103 FuBar - GuildFu - 2.4.4 - r117 FuBar 3.6 - v3.6.5 FuBar_CalendarFu - v3.1.0 FuBar_ClockFu - v3.2.0.0 FuBar_DualSpecFu - v2.0.0 FuBar_DurabilityFu - v2.12 FuBar_ExperienceFu - FuBar_ExperienceFu-r73249.12 FuBar_MailFu - v3.1.3-1 FuBar_PerformanceFu - v2.0.0 FuBar_RecountFu - v3.11-release FuBar_VoiceFu - v3.1.05 Gatherer - Gatherer 3.1.14 Gladiminish - v1.0 Gladius - v1.1.0 Grid - 1.30300.1265 GridStatusRaidDebuff - r261 release LibRock-1.0 - WoW-3.0-release-3 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.4.75 Minimap Button Frame - 3.0.10 Mounted - v2.1.5 Necrosis LdC - Necrosis v3.0 (r224) Omen Threat Meter - v3.0.9 OmniCC - 2.5.9 Outfitter - 4.10 PallyPower - v3.2.10-release Peggle - Peggle Addon for WoW v1.02c PitBull Unit Frames 4.0 - v4.0.0-beta8 Prat 3.0 - 3.3.2 Quartz - r23-release QuestHelper - 1.3.10 Recount - v3.3g release TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 1.1.2


> Posted by CurseForge user Xyos825 | Imported from CurseForge issue #6 | Raw

comments.body:
Multiple spells per icon is not currently supported and it's a low priority compared to other things I'd like to add.


> Posted by CurseForge user TheAtomicOption
